Record Class Coordinate

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
it.polimi.softeng.is25am10.model.boards.Coordinate
Record Components:
x - x coordinate
y - y coordinate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public record Coordinate(int x, int y) extends Record implements Serializable
Record used to store all the coordinates of the ship board. If a coordinate is not valid, it throws a IndexOutOfBoundsException.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Coordinate

      public Coordinate(int x, int y)
      Build a coordinate from a pair of raw coordinate.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the coordinate pair is not valid

  • Method Details

    • isInvalid

      public static boolean isInvalid(int x, int y)
      Check if a pair of (x, y) is a valid coordinate. It checks if it is not out of bound.
      Parameters:
      x - x coordinate
      y - y coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the coordinate is invalid, false if not

      Get the left coordinate position.
      Returns:
      new left coordinate
      Throws:

    • forEach

      public static void forEach(Consumer<Coordinate> consumer)
      Execute the consumer for every single coordinate. Used to iterate for every coordinate in the board.
      Parameters:
      consumer - to call for every coordinate.

    • forEachUntil

      public static void forEachUntil(Predicate<Coordinate> predicate)
      Execute the predicate for every single coordinate until it returns false. Used to iterate for every coordinate in the board.
      Parameters:
      predicate - to call for every coordinate

    • forEachUntil

      public static void forEachUntil(int x, Predicate<Coordinate> predicate)
      Execute the predicate for every single coordinate of a colum until it returns false. Used to iterate for every coordinate in the board.
      Parameters:
      x - the colum to iterate
      predicate - to call for every coordinate

    • forEachUntil

      public static void forEachUntil(Predicate<Coordinate> predicate, int y)
      Execute the predicate for every single coordinate of a row until it returns false. Used to iterate for every coordinate in the board.
      Parameters:
      predicate - to call for every coordinate
      y - the row to iterate

    • fromString

      public static Result<Coordinate> fromString(String s)
      Convert a string to a Coordinate. If the conversion fails, it returns an empty result. The coordinate must have this format: x0y0 to x6y4.
      Parameters:
      s - to convert
      Returns:
      ok(coordinate) it the conversion succeeded, err if not

      Convert this coordinate to the corresponding string.

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with the compare method from their corresponding wrapper classes.
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:

      Returns:
